application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front Garden R/BT1: Strawberry tree - Reduce height by 0.5, prune to shape, thin out by 5% and remove major dead wood  height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 4mT2: Strawberry tree - Reduce height by 0.5 - 1 metres, prune to shape, thin out by 5% and remove major dead wood height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 4m (Front Boundary) T3: Olive tree - Trim to shape height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5.8m & spread to 4mBack Garden (Left Boundary) T4: Bay tree (leaning on building) - Fell to ground level, grind out stump height 6m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0m(Right Boundary) T6: Yew tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump height 6m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0mT7: Fig tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stump  height 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0m(Back Boundary) T9: Willow tree - Reduce height by 2.5 - 3 metres, , remove epicormic growth, remove major dead wood, install cable bracing (large cavity present on the rear left-hand section) height 8m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 5mT10: Pittosporum tree x3 - trim to shape by around 0.5m height 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 4.5m & spread to 4mReason for work General tree maintenance More light trees in declineclearance from building
